sentences: Rudolf Lutz (born 1951) is a Swiss organist, harpsichordist, conductor and composer.
Lutz studied at the Zurich University of the Arts, in ZÃ¼rich and at the University of Music and Performing Arts, Vienna.
In 2006 Lutz was appointed artistic director of the J. S. Bach-Stiftung, which is based in St. Gallen.
The Foundation is engaged in a project to perform and record Bach's complete vocal works at a church in Trogen, a project which began in 2006 and was originally scheduled to take 25 years.
